name: Repulsive Display of Human Upholstery CD
description:
The second pressing of our debut album! Back in stock and ready to ship worldwide!

$3 shipping within the US.

$10 International shipping.

name: Slime Green, Pus Orange -or- Headbang or Die shirt
description:
Choose one of these killer designs for $12 each.

SLIME GREEN LOGO SHIRT:
Features of logo on the front in slime green and the Virginia Death Metal logo on the back. Also available in Pus Orange print now as well!

HEADBANG OR DIE SHIRT:
Features our logo on the front with the Headbang or Die back print. Also available in red with white logo and back print. 

Printed on Anvil brand t-shirts.

U.S. orders shipped via 2-3 day Priority Mail.

International orders shipped first class international with customs form number emailed to you.

ORDER WITH A HAT, CD, HOODIE, OR ANOTHER SHIRT AND RECEIVE COMBINED SHIPPING DISCOUNTS!

name: Necrotic Skin Stitching Long Sleeve
description:
Long sleeve shirt featuring the artwork of Mark Riddick on the front with "Tapestry of Carved Abominations" across the back. Logo sleeve prints on both sleeves. Definitely suitable for grim and frostbitten winter nights.

Printed on Anvil brand shirts.

All orders sent out next day via USPS priority mail or first class international.

name: Necrotic Skin Stitching t-shirt
description:
FEATURES THE ARTWORK OF MARK RIDDICK!
A sick design based off the lyrics to Necrotic Skin Stitching. Features an oversized front print designed by Mark Riddick and the lyrics "A Tapestry of Carved Abominations" on the back.

Add a 11"x17" poster with the Riddick artwork for only $3 more!

Printed on Anvil brand shirts.

options.name: Necrotic Skin Stitching with poster - Medium (Black)

name: Slam Hat
description:
Back by popular demand! Features our logo on the front with "SLAM" under the brim. 

All U.S. orders shipped out the next day via Priority mail with delivery confirmation. 

International orders shipped out the next day via first class mail with the customs form sent to your email.

ORDER WITH A HOODIE OR A SHIRT AND RECEIVE COMBINED SHIPPING DISCOUNTS!
